attributes.action: Allow elite sport to include female participation during lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Because it is discriminatory and highlights the inequalities prevalent in not only sport but society.
attributes.background: Treat female sporting members in the same way as their male counterparts.

rejection.details:
The current lockdown restrictions permits businesses that have otherwise been required to close to open for elite sports persons to train and compete (in indoor and outdoor sports facilities), irrespective of whether they are male or female.

If a business or sporting organisation is only arranging activites or opening for male sports persons you should raise your concerns with them directly.
